args.natural_language_statement: Suppose A is a subset of a topological space X. Prove that A ⊆ closure A. Provide Lean4 code using Mathlib import at top and end theorem with := by sorry (no full proof).

args.content:
import Mathlib

universe u
variable {X : Type u} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X}

open Set

theorem subset_closure : A ⊆ closure A := by sorry

import Mathlib.Topology.Basic

universe u
variable {X : Type u} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X}

theorem subset_closure : A ⊆ closure (A : Set X) := by sorry
